amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code to simplify certain provisions applicable to real estate investment trusts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 626 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 626 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6452-6454) To amend the Internal Revenue Code to simplify certain provisions applicable to real estate investment trusts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 626 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 626 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hatch.
